title: Ticket #6556: Update openmpiscript to work with shared filesystem
description:
A user on htcondor-users is using HTCondor with a shared filesystem (Rocks-based cluster) and the updated openmpiscript (and helper scripts) do not play nice with a shared fs. Updating the scripts with well-placed $_CONDOR_SCRATCH_DIR should resolve this.

(I should have seen this coming, as Miron would say, "there is nothing new under the sun," see #1732.)
remarks:
2018-Feb-05 10:22:08 by jpatton:
Placed the host file and orted command file underneath scratch. Also discovered during this testing that get_orted_cmd.sh is passed environment variables, so removed unnecessary redefinitions of _CONDOR vars.
